GE07naray__u:788: <12324.12/1> ṛṣaya ūcuḥ: dhānyair yaṣṭavyam ity eṣa /

GE07naray__u:864: <12324.26/101> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: kratuṃ samāpya piṣṭena /
GE07naray__u:868: <12324.27/001> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ sarve /
GE07naray__u:908: <12324.35/101> [X G1 ins:: gṛhītvā taṃ vasuṃ bhaktaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1203: <12326.17/2> uvāca vacanaṃ bhūyo gaccha nārada māciram //12326.17/
GE07naray__u:1234: <12326.25/101> [X K6 B9 Da3..a4 Dn4 ins:: na vidur munayaś caiva /
GE07naray__u:1244: <12326.27/101> [X K1.7 Da3..a4 D4.5.7.9 T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 ins:: paśya jīvasya māhātmyaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1248: <12326.27/103> [X K7 D4.9 cont:: sarvasthaḥ sarvago viśvaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1270: <12326.29/101> [X K7 D4.9 T G2.3.6 ins:: kālo hi paramaṃ bhūtaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1278: <12326.31/001> [X K1.2.4.7 Da3..a4 D4.5.7.9 T G1.3.6 M1.5-7 ins:: māṃ tu jānīhi brahmarṣe /
GE07naray__u:1298: <12326.35/001> [X K1.2.4.7 Da3..a4 D4.5.7.9 T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 ins:: pṛthagbhūtāś ca te nityaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1364: <12326.48/001> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.7.8 ins:: lalāṭāc caiva me rudro /
GE07naray__u:1426: <12326.62/101> [X G1 Kumbh..ed. ins:: evaṃ rudrāya manave /
GE07naray__u:1479: <12326.71/205> X rāmo rāmaś ca rāmaś ca /
GE07naray__u:1505: <12326.74/101> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.8 ins:: avadhyaḥ sarvalokānāṃ /
GE07naray__u:1537: <12326.77/101> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 77a:: dvāviṃśadyugaparyaye /
GE07naray__u:1562: <12326.82/001> [X Da4 Ds D7 T1 G3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins: :
GE07naray__u:1573: <12326.83/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 subst:: kalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhāv /
GE07naray__u:1593: <12326.86/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: kṛkalāsabhūtaṃ ca nṛgaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1607: <12326.88/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: kaṃsaṃ keśiṃ tathā krūram /
GE07naray__u:1640: D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 89:: duryodhanāparādhena /
GE07naray__u:1653: <12326.92/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: śastrair nipatitāḥ sarve /
GE07naray__u:1657: <12326.92/101> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins:: rājyaṃ praśāsati punaḥ /
GE07naray__u:1685: <12326.96/001> [X K1.2.4.7 D4.5.7.9 T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 ins:: puruṣaḥ sarvam evedam /
GE07naray__u:1711: <12326.102/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins:: śrutvā brahmamukhād rudraḥ /
GE07naray__u:1755: <12326.111/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins:: evaṃ paraṃparākhyātam /
GE07naray__u:1761: <12326.112/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins:: nāradāc caiva devarṣeḥ /
GE07naray__u:1887: <12327.8/1> kiṃ nu brahmā ca rudraś ca /
GE07naray__u:1938: <12327.19/101> [X K6 ins:: kiṃ tu brahmātha rudro vā /
GE07naray__u:1998: <12327.30/101> [X K7 D4.9 ins:: etān vai sumahābhāgān /
GE07naray__u:2209: <12327.77/001> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.8 ins:: devā devarṣayaś cocus /
GE07naray__u:2270: <12327.89/1> sa ādiḥ sa madhyaḥ sa cāntaḥ prajānāṃ /
GE07naray__u:2271: <12327.89/2> sa dhātā sa dheyaḥ sa kartā sa kāryam /
GE07naray__u:2274: <12327.90/001> [X K1.2.4 subst:: sa ādiḥ sa ca madhyaṃ vai /
GE07naray__u:2349: <12327.107/001> [X B6 ins:: ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2445: <12328.20/001> [X Ds D8 Cs ins:: yo 'sau rudraḥ so 'ham asmi /
GE07naray__u:2465: <12328.23/2> yas taṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti /
GE07naray__u:2466: yo 'nu taṃ sa hi mām anu //12328.23/
GE07naray__u:2598: <12328.53/4> ekayonitvāc ca parasparaṃ mahayanto lokān dhārayata iti //12328.53/
GE07naray__u:2613: <12329.3/5> naiva rātryāṃ na divase na sati nāsati na vyakte nāvyakte vyavasthite /
GE07naray__u:2614: <12329.3/6> etasyām avasthāyāṃ nārāyaṇaguṇāśrayād akṣayād ajarād anindriyād agrāhyād asaṃbhavāt satyād ahiṃsrāl lalāmād vividhapravṛttiviśeṣāt
GE07naray__u:2615: <12329.3/7> akṣayād ajarāmarād amūrtitaḥ sarvavyāpinaḥ sarvakartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūto harir avyayaḥ //12329.3/
GE07naray__u:2621: <12329.5/1> tasyedānīṃ tamaḥsaṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoner brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇo netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja
GE07naray__u:2622: <12329.5/2> tato bhūtasarge pravṛtte prajākramavaśād brahmakṣatram upātiṣṭhat /
GE07naray__u:2623: <12329.5/3> yaḥ somas tad brahma yad brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2624: <12329.5/4> yo 'gnis tat kṣatraṃ kṣatrād brahma balavattaram /
GE07naray__u:2625: <12329.5/5> kasmād iti lokapratyakṣaguṇam etat tad yathā /
GE07naray__u:2628: <12329.5/8> bhūtasargaḥ kṛto brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyaṃ dhāryatae iti //12329.5/
GE07naray__u:2637: <12329.7/1> na hy ete mantrād dhavanam asti /
GE07naray__u:2639: <12329.7/3> havir mantrāṇāṃ saṃpūjā vidyate devamanuṣyāṇām anena tvaṃ hoteti niyuktaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2640: <12329.7/4> ye ca mānuṣā hotrādhikārās te ca /
GE07naray__u:2641: <12329.7/5> brāhmaṇasya hi yājanaṃ vidhīyate na kṣatravaiśyayor dvijātyoḥ /
GE07naray__u:2642: <12329.7/6> tasmād brāhmaṇā hy agnibhūtā yajñān udvahanti /
GE07naray__u:2643: <12329.7/7> yajñā devāṃs tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhāvayanti //12329.7/
GE07naray__u:2645: <12329.8/2> agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yo vidvān brāhmaṇamukhe dānāhutiṃ juhoti /
GE07naray__u:2646: <12329.8/3> evam apy agnibhūtā brāhmaṇā vidvāṃso 'gniṃ bhāvayanti /
GE07naray__u:2647: <12329.8/4> agnir viṣṇuḥ sarvabhūtāny anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati /
GE07naray__u:2665: <12329.13/1> vedapurāṇetihāsaprāmāṇyān nārāyaṇamukhodgatāḥ sarvātmānaḥ sarvakartāraḥ sarvabhāvanāś ca brāhmaṇāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2666: <12329.13/2> vāksamakālaṃ hi tasya devasya varapradasya brāhmaṇāḥ prathamaṃ prādurbhūtā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca śeṣā varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2667: <12329.13/3> itthaṃ ca surāsuraviśiṣṭā brāhmaṇā yadā mayā brahmabhūtena purā svayam evotpāditāḥ surāsuramaharṣayo bhūtaviśeṣāḥ sthāpitā nigṛhītāś ca //12329.13/
GE07naray__u:2668: <12329.14/1> ahalyādharṣaṇanimittaṃ hi gautamād dhariśmaśrutām indraḥ prāptaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2670: <12329.14/3> aśvinor grahapratiṣedhodyatavajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhito bāhuḥ /
GE07naray__u:2671: <12329.14/4> kratuvadhaprāptamanyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā cātmānaṃ saṃyojya netrākṛtir anyā lalāṭe rudrasyotpāditā //12329.14/
GE07naray__u:2672: <12329.15/1> tripuravadhārthaṃ dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasyośanasā śiraso jaṭā utkṛtya prayuktāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2674: <12329.15/3> tair asya bhujagaiḥ_1 pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭho nīlatām upanītaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2675: <12329.15/4> pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇahastabandhagrahaṇān nīlakaṇṭhatvam eva vā //12329.15/
GE07naray__u:2676: <12329.16/1> amṛtotpādane puraścaraṇatām upagatasyāṅgiraso bṛhaspater upaspṛśato na prasādaṃ gatavatyaḥ kilāpaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2678: <12329.16/3> yasmān mamopaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtā na prasādam upagatās tasmād adyaprabhṛti jhaṣamakaramatsyakacchapajantusaṃkīrṇāḥ kaluṣībhavateti
GE07naray__u:2680: <12329.17/1> viśvarūpo vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohito devānām āsīt svasrīyo 'surāṇām /
GE07naray__u:2681: <12329.17/2> sa pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asurebhyaḥ //12329.17/
GE07naray__u:2682: <12329.18/1> atha hiraṇyakaśipuṃ puraskṛtya_1 viśvarūpamātaraṃ svasāram asurā varam ayācanta /
GE07naray__u:2683: <12329.18/2> he svasar ayaṃ te putras tvāṣṭro viśvarūpas triśirā devānāṃ purohitaḥ pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asmākam /
GE07naray__u:2685: <12329.18/4> tad enaṃ tvaṃ vārayitum arhasi tathā yathāsmān bhajed iti //12329.18/
GE07naray__u:2687: <12329.19/2> putra kiṃ parapakṣavardhanas tvaṃ mātulapakṣaṃ nāśayasi /
GE07naray__u:2689: <12329.19/4> sa viśvarūpo mātur vākyam anatikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt //12329.19/
GE07naray__u:2690: <12329.20/1> hairaṇyagarbhāc ca vasiṣṭhād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpaṃ prāptavān /
GE07naray__u:2691: <12329.20/2> yasmāt tvayānyo vṛto hotā tasmād asamāptayajñas tvam apūrvāt sattvajātād vadhaṃ prāpsyasīti /
GE07naray__u:2694: <12329.21/2> tasya vratabhaṅgārtham indro bahvīḥ śrīmatyo 'psaraso niyuyoja /
GE07naray__u:2695: <12329.21/3> tāś ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitam tasyābhavat tāsu cāpsaraḥsu nacirād eva sakto 'bhavat /
GE07naray__u:2696: <12329.21/4> saktaṃ cainaṃ jñātvāpsarasa ūcur gacchāmahe vayaṃ yathāgatam iti //12329.21/
GE07naray__u:2698: <12329.22/2> kva gamiṣyatha āsyatām tāvan mayā saha śreyo bhaviṣyatīti /
GE07naray__u:2700: <12329.22/4> vayaṃ devastriyo 'psarasa indraṃ varadaṃ purā prabhaviṣṇuṃ vṛṇīmahae iti //12329.22/
GE07naray__u:2701: <12329.23/1> atha tā viśvarūpo 'bravīd adyaiva sendrā devā na bhaviṣyantīti /
GE07naray__u:2704: <12329.23/4> ekenāsyena sarvalokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhir yajñeṣu suhutaṃ somaṃ papāv ekenāpa ekena sendrān devān /
GE07naray__u:2705: <12329.23/5> athendras taṃ vivardhamānaṃ somapānāpyāyitasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede //12329.23/
GE07naray__u:2706: <12329.24/1> devāś ca te sahendreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmur ūcuś ca /
GE07naray__u:2710: <12329.24/5> tad arhasi no vidhātuṃ śreyo yad anantaram iti //12329.24/
GE07naray__u:2711: <12329.25/1> tān brahmovāca ṛṣir bhārgavas tapas tapyate dadhīcaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2712: <12329.25/2> sa yācyatāṃ varaṃ yathā kalevaraṃ jahyāt /
GE07naray__u:2714: <12329.26/1> devās tatrāgacchan yatra dadhīco bhagavān ṛṣis tapas tepe /
GE07naray__u:2715: <12329.26/2> sendrā devās tam abhigamyocur bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnaṃ ceti /
GE07naray__u:2716: <12329.26/3> tān dadhīca uvāca svāgataṃ bhavadbhyaḥ kiṃ kriyatām /
GE07naray__u:2718: <12329.26/5> te tam abruvañ śarīraparityāgaṃ lokahitārthaṃ bhagavān kartum arhatīti /
GE07naray__u:2719: <12329.26/501> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: evam ukto dadhīcas tān abravīt /
GE07naray__u:2720: <12329.26/502> X sahasraṃ varṣāṇām aindraṃ padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām /
GE07naray__u:2721: <12329.26/503> X tathety uktvendraḥ svasthānaṃ dattvā tapasvy- abhavat /
GE07naray__u:2723: <12329.26/505> X tāvat pūrṇe sendrā devā āgaman kālo 'yaṃ dehanyāsāyeti /12329.26871/ X]
GE07naray__u:2724: <12329.26/6> atha dadhīcas tathaivāvimanāḥ sukhaduḥkhasamo mahāyogī ātmānaṃ samādhāya śarīraparityāgaṃ cakāra //12329.26/
GE07naray__u:2725: <12329.27/001> [X Kumbh..ed. ins:: śrutir apy atra bhavati /
GE07naray__u:2726: <12329.27/002> X indro dadhīco 'sthibhiḥ kṛtam iti /12329.26872/ X]
GE07naray__u:2727: <12329.27/1> tasya paramātmany avasṛte tāny asthīni dhātā saṃgṛhya vajram akarot /
GE07naray__u:2728: <12329.27/2> tena vajreṇābhedyenāpradhṛṣyeṇa brahmāsthisaṃbhūtena viṣṇupraviṣṭenendro viśvarūpaṃ jaghāna /
GE07naray__u:2730: <12329.27/301> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. Cv:: takṣṇā yajñapaśoḥ śiras te dadāmīty uktvā /12329.27873/ X]
GE07naray__u:2731: <12329.27/4> tasmād anantaraṃ viśvarūpagātramathanasaṃbhavaṃ tvaṣṭrotpāditam evāriṃ vṛtram indro jaghāna //12329.27/
GE07naray__u:2732: <12329.28/1> tasyāṃ dvaidhībhūtāyāṃ brahmavadhyāyāṃ bhayād indro devarājyaṃ parityajya apsusaṃbhavāṃ śītalāṃ mānasasarogatāṃ nalinīṃ apsu /
GE07naray__u:2733: <12329.28/2> tatra caiśvaryayogād aṇumātro bhūtvā bisagranthiṃ praviveśa //12329.28/
GE07naray__u:2734: <12329.29/1> atha brahmavadhyābhayapranaṣṭe trailokyanāthe śacīpatau jagad anīśvaraṃ babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2740: <12329.30/1> atha devā ṛṣayaś cāyuṣaḥ putraṃ nahuṣaṃ nāma devarājatve 'bhiṣiṣicuḥ /
GE07naray__u:2741: <12329.30/2> nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śatair jyotiṣāṃ lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ sarvatejoharais triviṣṭapaṃ pālayāṃ babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2742: <12329.30/3> atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāś ca babhūvuḥ //12329.30/
GE07naray__u:2744: <12329.31/2> sarvaṃ māṃ śakropabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm iti /
GE07naray__u:2745: <12329.31/3> sa evam uktvā śacīsamīpam agamad uvāca cainām /
GE07naray__u:2746: <12329.31/4> subhage 'ham indro devānāṃ bhajasva mām iti /
GE07naray__u:2752: <12329.32/3> aham indrasya rājyaratnaharo nātrādharmaḥ kaścit tvam indrabhukteti /
GE07naray__u:2755: <12329.32/6> tasyāvabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiścid evāhobhir iti /
GE07naray__u:2757: <12329.33/1> atha śacī duḥkhaśokārtā bhartṛdarśanalālasā nahuṣabhayagṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat /
GE07naray__u:2758: <12329.33/2> sa ca tām abhigatāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dhyānaṃ praviśya bhartṛkāryatatparāṃ jñātvā bṛhaspatir uvāca /
GE07naray__u:2759: <12329.33/3> anenaiva vratena tapasā cānvitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutim āhvaya /
GE07naray__u:2761: <12329.34/1> sātha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutiṃ mantrair āhvayat /
GE07naray__u:2763: <12329.34/3> uvāca cainām iyam asmi tvayopahūtopasthitā kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti /
GE07naray__u:2764: <12329.34/4> tāṃ mūrdhnā praṇamyovāca śacī bhagavaty arhasi me bhartāraṃ darśayituṃ tvaṃ satyā matā ceti /
GE07naray__u:2767: <12329.35/1> tām indraḥ patnīṃ kṛśāṃ glānāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintayāṃ babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2768: <12329.35/2> aho mama mahad duḥkham idam adyopagatam /
GE07naray__u:2769: <12329.35/3> naṣṭaṃ hi mām iyam anviṣyopāgamad duḥkhārteti /
GE07naray__u:2776: <12329.36/3> nahuṣas tvayā vācyo 'pūrveṇa mām ṛṣiyuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍha udvahasva /
GE07naray__u:2777: <12329.36/4> indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇy adhirūḍhāni mayā /
GE07naray__u:2781: <12329.37/1> athendrāṇim abhyāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvovāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kāla iti /
GE07naray__u:2783: <12329.37/3> sa maharṣiyuktaṃ vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacīsamīpam upāgacchat //12329.37/
GE07naray__u:2784: <12329.38/1> atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayonir agastyo maharṣīn vikriyamāṇāṃs tān nahuṣeṇāpaśyat /
GE07naray__u:2786: <12329.38/3> tataḥ sa nahuṣam abravīd akāryapravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm /
GE07naray__u:2787: <12329.38/4> sarpo bhava yāvad bhūmir girayaś ca tiṣṭheyus tāvad iti /
GE07naray__u:2788: <12329.38/5> sa maharṣivākyasamakālam eva tasmād yānād avāpatat //12329.38/
GE07naray__u:2790: <12329.39/2> tato devā ṛṣayaś ca bhagavantaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaraṇam indrārthe 'bhijagmuḥ /
GE07naray__u:2791: <12329.39/3> ūcuś cainaṃ bhagavann indraṃ brahmavadhyābhibhūtaṃ trātum arhasīti /
GE07naray__u:2792: <12329.39/4> tataḥ sa varadas tān abravīd aśvamedhaṃ yajñaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śakro 'bhiyajatu /
GE07naray__u:2794: <12329.40/1> tato devā ṛṣayaś cendraṃ nāpaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcur gaccha subhage indram ānayasveti /
GE07naray__u:2796: <12329.40/3> indraś ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma /
GE07naray__u:2798: <12329.40/5> tataḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaṃ medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanaṃ tam eva kṛtvā indraṃ marutpatiṃ bṛhaspatiḥ svasthānaṃ prāpayām āsa //12329.40/
GE07naray__u:2799: <12329.41/1> tataḥ sa devarāḍ devair ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapastho niṣkalmaṣo babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2801: <12329.41/201> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Cs.v ins:: vanitāsu rajaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2806: <12329.41/206> X tasmād dhavir alavaṇaṃ pacyate /12329.41874/ X]
GE07naray__u:2807: <12329.41/3> evaṃ indro brahmatejaḥprabhāvopabṛṃhitaḥ śatruvadhaṃ kṛtvā svasthānaṃ prāpitaḥ //12329.41/
GE07naray__u:2808: <12329.42/001> [X D7 T1 G1.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: nahuṣasya śāpamokṣanimittaṃ devair ṛṣibhir yācyamāno 'gastyaḥ prāha /
GE07naray__u:2813: <12329.42/1> ākāśagaṅgāgataś ca purā bharadvājo maharṣir upāspṛśaṃs trīn kramān kramatā viṣṇunābhyāsāditaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2814: <12329.42/2> sa bharadvājena sasalilena pāṇinorasi tāḍitaḥ salakṣaṇoraskaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //12329.42/
GE07naray__u:2816: <12329.44/1> aditir vai devānām annam apacad etad bhuktvāsurān haniṣyantīti /
GE07naray__u:2819: <12329.44/4> tatra devaiḥ pūrvam etat prāśyaṃ nānyenety aditir bhikṣāṃ nādāt /
GE07naray__u:2820: <12329.44/5> atha bhikṣāpratyākhyānaruṣitena budhena brahmabhūtena vivasvato dvitīye janmany aṇḍasaṃjñitasyāṇḍaṃ māritam adityāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2821: <12329.44/501> [X K6.7 V1 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2-5.7-9 Cs Kumbh..ed. ins. after brahmabhūtena: :
GE07naray__u:2822: aditiḥ śaptā aditer udare bhaviṣyati vyathā /12329.44876/ X]
GE07naray__u:2825: <12329.45/2> tābhyaḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa prādād daśa dharmāya daśa manave saptaviṃśatim indave /
GE07naray__u:2826: <12329.45/3> tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatrākhyāṃ gatāsu somo rohiṇyām abhyadhikāṃ prītim akarot /
GE07naray__u:2827: <12329.45/4> tatas tāḥ śeṣāḥ patnya īrṣyāvatyaḥ pituḥ samīpaṃ somo rohiṇīm adhikaṃ bhajatīti /
GE07naray__u:2831: <12329.46/3> dakṣaś cainam abravīn na samaṃ vartasae iti /
GE07naray__u:2838: <12329.46/91> tatra cāvabhāsitas tīrthe yadā somas tadāprabhṛti tīrthaṃ tat prabhāsam iti nāmnā khyātaṃ babhūva (/)
GE07naray__u:2841: <12329.46/94> meghasadṛśaṃ varṇam agamat tad asya śaśalakṣma vimalam abhavat //12329.46/
GE07naray__u:2842: <12329.47/1> sthūlaśirā maharṣir meroḥ prāguttare digbhāge tapas tepe /
GE07naray__u:2843: <12329.47/2> tasya tapas tapyamānasya sarvagandhavahaḥ śucir vāyur vivāyamānaḥ śarīram aspṛśat /
GE07naray__u:2844: <12329.47/3> sa tapasā tāpitaśarīraḥ kṛśo vāyunopavījyamāno hṛdayaparitoṣam agamat /
GE07naray__u:2845: <12329.47/4> tatra tasyānilavyajanakṛtaparitoṣasya sadyo vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaśobhāṃ na darśitavanta iti sa etāñ śaśāpa na sarvakālaṃ puṣpavanto bhaviṣyatheti //12329.47/
GE07naray__u:2846: <12329.48/1> nārāyaṇo lokahitārthaṃ vaḍavāmukho nāma maharṣiḥ purābhavat /
GE07naray__u:2847: <12329.48/2> tasya merau tapas tapyataḥ samudra āhūto nāgataḥ /
GE07naray__u:2851: <12329.48/6> etac ca te toyaṃ vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitena pīyamānaṃ madhuraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE07naray__u:2852: <12329.48/7> tad etad adyāpi vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitenānuvartinā toyaṃ sāmudraṃ pīyate //12329.48/
GE07naray__u:2853: <12329.49/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: punar umā dakṣakopād dhimavato girer duhitā babhūva /12329.48877/ X]
GE07naray__u:2854: <12329.49/1> himavato girer duhitaram umāṃ rudraś cakame /
GE07naray__u:2855: <12329.49/2> bhṛgur api ca maharṣir himavantam āgamyābravīt kanyām umāṃ me dehīti /
GE07naray__u:2856: <12329.49/3> tam abravīd dhimavān abhilaṣito varo rudra iti /
GE07naray__u:2857: <12329.49/4> tam abravīd bhṛgur yasmāt tvayāhaṃ kanyāvaraṇakṛtabhāvaḥ pratyākhyātas tasmān na ratnānāṃ bhavān bhājanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GE07naray__u:2860: <12329.50/2> kṣatram api śāśvatīm avyayāṃ pṛthivīṃ patnīm abhigamya bubhuje /
GE07naray__u:2938: <12330.19/001> [X D7 T G2.3.6 ins:: adho na kṣīyate yasmād /
GE07naray__u:2964: <12330.25/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins:: nādimantaṃ na cāntaṃ ca /
GE07naray__u:2966: <12330.25/1> na cādiṃ na madhyaṃ tathā naiva cāntaṃ /
GE07naray__u:2968: <12330.25/3> anādyo hy amadhyas tathā cāpy anantaḥ /
GE07naray__u:3080: <12330.50/003> X uccheṣaṇabhāgo vai rudras tasyoccheṣaṇena hotavyam iti sarve gamyarūpeṇa tadā /12330.49881/ X]
GE07naray__u:3147: <12330.64/1> yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti /
GE07naray__u:3148: yas tvām anu sa mām anu /
GE07naray__u:3246: <12331.13/201> [X T2 G1.2 ins:: dṛṣṭavān yo hariṃ devaṃ /
GE07naray__u:3270: <12331.19/001> [X K1.2.4 V1 ins. after 18:: sūta uvāca:
GE07naray__u:3279: <12331.19/005> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 18:: sūta uvāca:
GE07naray__u:3295: <12331.20/001> [X T1 G3.6 T2 G1.2 ins:: nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ /
GE07naray__u:3518: <12332.14/001> [X V1 B6.8 D7 T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 Kumbh..ed. ins:: jvālāmālī mahātejā /
GE07naray__u:3554: <12332.22/001> [X D7 T G2.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins. after 21,
GE07naray__u:3762: <12334.14/3> ekāntināṃ śaraṇado 'bhayado gatido 'stu vaḥ sa makhabhāgaharas triguṇātigaḥ //12334.14/
GE07naray__u:3810: <12335.8/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins:: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi /
GE07naray__u:4450: <12336.62/001> [X T1 G3.6 ins:: tad eva kevalaṃ sthānaṃ /
GE07naray__u:4656: <12337.27/002> [X D7 T1 G3.6 cont:: tathākaroc ca dharmātmā /
GE07naray__u:4756: <12337.48/6> tasmād ṛṣes tvaṃ bhavitā ca putraḥ //12337.48/
GE07naray__u:4847: <12337.68/1> sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dve /
GE07naray__u:5042: <12339.18/1> yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ /
GE07naray__u:5044: <12339.18/3> yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu /
GE07naray__u:5049: <12339.19/4> tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ /
GE07naray__u:5079: <12999.31/01> X na mitraṃ na kalatraṃ vā /
GE07naray__u:5130: <12999.32/012> X sūta uvāca: tasmin yajñe vartamāne /
GE07naray__u:5143: <12999.32/018> X badary-āśramam āgamya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī /
GE07naray__u:5145: kāṃ kathām pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ /12999.32/ X]
